monkstone.core

Class LibraryProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • monkstone.core.LibraryProxy

  • public abstract class LibraryProxy
extends Object
    The purpose of this class is to enable access to processing pre, draw and post loops in ruby-processing as a regular java library class. Also included background, fill and stroke methods. PConstants should also be available from static import
    Author:
    Martin Prout

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int height

      Useful accessors

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PApplet app()
      Access applet if we must
      void background(int col)
      Simple signature for background hides need to call app
      void dispose()
      required for processing
      abstract void draw()
      Extending classes must implement this gives access to processing PApplet draw loop
      void fill(int col)
      Simple signature for fill hides need to call app
      abstract void post()
      Extending classes must implement this gives access to, by reflection, processing PApplet post loop (called after draw)
      abstract void pre()
      Extending classes must implement this gives access to, by reflection, processing PApplet pre loop (called before draw)
      void stroke(int col)
      Simple signature for stroke hides need to call app
